item.title: Azurewaf
item.description: Azure Web Application Firewall Brief Overview: Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) gives centralized assurance of your web applications from common misuses and vulnerabilities. Web applications are progressively focused on by malevolent assaults that misuse commonly known vulnerabilities. SQL injection and cross-site scripting are among the most common attacks. Azure WAF can be leveraged on several PaaS features in Azure such as: Azure Application Gateway Azure CDN Azure Front Door Azure Application Gateway Brief Overview Using the Azure WAF features the Application Portal works as an application delivery controller (ADC).
